name: Star Blast
description:
❂❂❂❂❂❂❂   S T A R B L A S T  ❂❂❂❂❂❂❂

➊ Use ARROW keys, WASD, mouse or touchscreen.
➋ Blast the enemies and upgrade your ship!

Yes, you can shop with the keys too if you want!

Official cheat to thank you for reading this far.  If you click on the rebel base, it doubles your cash - works once per game.
